turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I would like a Starbucks espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which starbucks should i place the order at

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one in Chicago, Illinois State Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have vanilla bean with whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size did you want that drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you said a venti vanilla bean with 2% milk and whipped cream from starbucks on state street in chicago.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is your total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the drink will be ready in 10 minutes. i've sent your receipt to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool, you're welcome.
